capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm certain of his age. It seems pretty clear-cut, doesn't it?
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of someone named dudley before, can you tell me more about him?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Dudley's personality and it seems to me that he is indeed quite selfish. I mean, his actions have shown that he prioritizes his own needs and desires over others, which can be really frustrating at times. But, I guess that's just how he rolls, right?
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of someone being described as selfish before, valeria, can you tell me more about what that means to you?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's personality is often described as selfish. I've noticed that about him myself. He can come across as quite self-centered at times, which can be frustrating for those around him.

You know, I've noticed that Dudley has a bit of a reputation for being quite selfish. He's always looking out for number one, and it can be hard to get him to consider anyone else's feelings or needs.
